name: Quern

pages.text: The $(thing)Quern$() is a device for grinding items. It can make powders, dyes, and some other items. It is assembled from a $(thing)Base$() and $(thing)Handstone$().
The base of the quern can be crafted with three $(thing)smooth stone$() and three of any other $(thing)Stone$() blocks.
The quern needs a $(thing)Handstone$() to operate.
Point at the top of the quern block and $(item)$(k:key.use)$() to place the handstone.
Use $(item)$(k:key.use)$() on the top of the handstone to add items.
Use $(item)$(k:key.use)$() the handle to spin the handstone.
The output should appear on the base of the quern. $(item)$(k:key.use)$() anywhere on the base to retrieve it.
The quern is used to make various $(thing)Powders$() from ores, like $(thing)Sulfur$().
$(thing)Dye$() can be obtained from various flowers.
$(l:the_world/waterways#gemstones)Gems$() can also be ground into powder.
$(thing)Flour$() is also obtainable from the quern.
$(l:mechanics/flux)Flux$() is also obtainable from the quern.
